casebody.data:
POTTLE, et al.
v.
LINK, et al. No. 27PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Cheryl A. Marteney, New Bern, G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Wilmington, Signey S. Eagles, Jr., Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Raleigh, for Link and Willetts. David S. Pokela, Greensboro, for Duke Energy Carolinas. Matthew D. Rhoad, Andrea B. Short, Raleigh, for CP&L, et al. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 654 S.E.2d 64 . The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 30th day of September 2008 for Motion to Dismiss Appeal: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008." MARTIN, J., recused.
